Binary: gmerlin, gmerlin-plugins-base, gmerlin-data, libgmerlin2t64, libgmerlin-common, libgmerlin-dev
Build-Depends: dpkg-dev (>= 1.22.5), debhelper-compat (= 13), devscripts, dh-buildinfo, doxygen, fontconfig, gnulib, libasound2-dev [linux-any], libcddb2-dev, libcdio-paranoia-dev, libexif-dev, libfreetype-dev, libgavl-dev (>= 2~), libglu1-mesa-dev, libgtk-3-dev, libjpeg-dev, libjson-c-dev, libmusicbrainz5-dev, libncurses-dev, libpng-dev, libpulse-dev, libquicktime-dev, libsqlite3-dev, libtiff-dev, libv4l-dev [linux-any], libvisual-0.4-dev, libxml2-dev, libxv-dev, texinfo
Package-List: gmerlin deb sound optional arch=any gmerlin-data deb sound optional arch=all gmerlin-plugins-base deb sound optional arch=any libgmerlin-common deb libs optional arch=any libgmerlin-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libgmerlin2t64 deb libs optional arch=any
